channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: You Can Now See the Code That Helped End Apartheid
item.description: John Graham-Cumming, who happens to be Cloudflare's CTO, cracked a 30-year-old encrypted file that had a role in rewriting South Africa’s history.

item.title: Sony's PSVR2 PC Adapter Is a Poor Apology to PlayStation Fans
item.description: A lackluster accessory that gives Sony's VR headset a new lease on life only highlights the failures of the platform.

item.title: Nebius to resume Nasdaq trading after severing ties with Russia and Yandex
item.description: Nebius, the company formerly known as Yandex that’s now focused on cloud infrastructure for AI uses (aka “AI compute”), is to begin trading on the pub...

item.title: It Sure Looks Like Trump Watches Are Breaking Copyright Law
item.description: The company behind Trump Watches prominently features an iconic image of the presidential candidate on its timepieces. There’s one big problem: It’s n...

item.title: Bluesky surges into the top 5 as X changes blocks, permits AI training on its data
item.description: Social networking startup Bluesky, which just reported a gain of half a million users over the past day, has now soared into the top 5 apps on the U.S...

item.title: How to Remove and Replace Your AirTag’s Battery
item.description: Is your Apple AirTag running low on power? Here’s how to replace that battery and get back to tracking.

item.title: Byju’s founder says his edtech startup, once worth $22B, is now ‘worth zero’
item.description: Byju Raveendran, the founder of the embattled edtech group Byju’s, acknowledged on Thursday afternoon that he made mistakes, mistimed the market, over...

item.title: Elehear Beyond Review: Super Big Hearing Aids
item.description: At nearly twice the size of some competitors, Elehear’s new hearing aids certainly make a statement.

item.title: The surprising way OpenAI could get out of its pact with Microsoft
item.description: The New York Times on Thursday published a look at the “fraying” relationship between OpenAI and its investor, partner, and, increasingly, rival, Micr...

item.title: Tesla’s Full Self-Driving software under investigation by federal safety regulator
item.description: The U.S. automotive safety regulator has opened a new investigation into Tesla's Full Self-Driving (Supervised) software after four reported crashes i...
